long_description: With a smooth-shifting internally geared rear hub, the Diamondback Clarity STI-8 women's hybrid bike offers a clean, speedy and comfortable platform for day-in, day-out riding around town. Sturdy aluminum frame provides a comfortable upright ride, reducing body strains and enhancing visibility; frame has been specifically crafted to deliver a great fit for women. Shimano Nexus internally geared rear hub provides 8 smooth-shifting gears to comfortably cruise cities and paths; twist-grip shifter changes gears with a flick of a wrist. Internally geared hubs require much less maintenance when compared to derailleur-and-cassette systems. Linear-pull brakes offer easy speed management. Speedy 700c wheels are outfitted with puncture-resistant Kenda Kwik Trax tires for low rolling resistance and comfortable handling. Diamondback Performance Hybrid seat features gel padding for extended comfort in the saddle. Frame eyelets accept fenders or a rear rack for added utility (not included). Specs on the Diamondback Clarity STI-8 hybrid bike are subject to change.
short_description: With a smooth-shifting internally geared rear hub, the Diamondback Clarity STI-8 women's hybrid bike offers a clean, speedy and comfortable platform for day-in, day-out riding around town.
